segment.source: To successfully deploy Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), you have to:
segment.target: To successfully deploy Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), you have to:

segment.target: Task

segment.source: Copy the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates.
segment.target: Copy the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates.

segment.source: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates
segment.target: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates

segment.source: Determine which Group Policy Objects (GPOs) you want to use in your MBAM implementation.
segment.target: Determine which Group Policy Objects (GPOs) you want to use in your MBAM implementation.

segment.source: Based on the needs of your organization, you might have to configure additional Group Policy settings.
segment.target: Based on the needs of your organization, you might have to configure additional Group Policy settings.

segment.source: Planning for MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Requirements – contains descriptions of the GPOs
segment.target: Planning for MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Requirements – contains descriptions of the GPOs

segment.source: Set the Group Policy settings for your organization.
segment.target: Set the Group Policy settings for your organization.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Do not change the Group Policy settings in the BitLocker Drive Encryption node, or MBAM will not work correctly.
segment.target: Do not change the Group Policy settings in the BitLocker Drive Encryption node, or MBAM will not work correctly.

segment.source: When you configure the Group Policy settings in the MDOP MBAM (BitLocker Management) node, MBAM automatically configures the BitLocker Drive Encryption settings for you.
segment.target: When you configure the Group Policy settings in the MDOP MBAM (BitLocker Management) node, MBAM automatically configures the BitLocker Drive Encryption settings for you.

segment.source: To edit MBAM Client Group Policy settings
segment.target: To edit MBAM Client Group Policy settings

segment.source: On a computer that has the MBAM Group Policy Templates installed, make sure that MBAM Services are enabled.
segment.target: On a computer that has the MBAM Group Policy Templates installed, make sure that MBAM Services are enabled.

segment.source: Using the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC.msc) or the Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management MDOP product on a computer with the MBAM Group Policy Templates installed, select Computer configurationPoliciesAdministrative TemplatesWindows ComponentsMDOP MBAM (BitLocker Management).
segment.target: Using the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC.msc) or the Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management MDOP product on a computer with the MBAM Group Policy Templates installed, select Computer configurationPoliciesAdministrative TemplatesWindows ComponentsMDOP MBAM (BitLocker Management).

segment.source: Edit the Group Policy settings that are required to enable MBAM Client services on client computers.
segment.target: Edit the Group Policy settings that are required to enable MBAM Client services on client computers.

segment.source: For each policy in the following table, select Policy Group, click the Policy you want, and then configure the settings.
segment.target: For each policy in the following table, select Policy Group, click the Policy you want, and then configure the settings.
